mapper.select: select c.create_time,a.*,u.nickname as username,u.avatar as userAvatar, b.NAME AS categoryName, b.id AS categoryId from b_article a left join b_collect c on c.article_id = a.id left JOIN b_category b ON a.category_id = b.id left join b_user u on a.user_id = u.id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.create_time desc
